name: Tower Barrage
description:
In the Tower Barrage game, the goal is to max out all the upgrades or to accumulate level 100.

One of the good tactics is to get two more wheelbarrows as close to the tower followed by two more projectiles.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can follow me on Twitter for future projects

https://twitter.com/Games4ge

This is my second published game. If you have any suggestions for additional features I will consider them and create a mobile version of the game.

If you liked the game enough, please consider supporting the game.
